game.beginning: The year is 2256, and humanity has colonized several planets in the distant reaches of the galaxy. You are a skilled space explorer hired by a wealthy client to retrieve a rare artifact from an abandoned research station on the planet Xylophia-IV.
game.ending: After successfully retrieving the artifact, you must weigh your loyalties and decide whether to return it or keep it for yourself. Overcome challenges, uncover secrets, and navigate the moral consequences of your decision in "Lost Relic of Xylophia."
game.synopsis: Lost Relic of Xylophia is a gripping adventure game that takes you on a thrilling journey through an abandoned research station. Explore a mysterious planet, battle hostile aliens, and confront the hidden agenda behind the artifact's discovery. Will you fulfill your mission or succumb to the station's secrets?
game.title: Lost Relic of Xylophia
